entry.string: Your PHP configuration does not seem to include the required LDAP extension. Please refer to http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php on how to install it.
entry.translation: Tu configuración PHP no parece incluir la extensión LDAP requerida. por favor refiérete a http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.ldap.php sobre cómo instalarla.

entry.string: LDAP Error: Connection to server #(1) port_number #(2) failed
entry.translation: Error LDAP: Falló la conexión al servidor #(1) port_number #(2)

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to set LDAP Protocol version to 3
entry.translation: Error LDAP: Falló en configurar la versión del Protocolo LDAP a 3

entry.string: LDAP Error: Failed to start TLS
entry.translation: Error LDAP: Falló en iniciar TLS

entry.string: LDAP Error: Search LDAP base_dn #(1) filter #(2) failed
entry.translation: Error LDAP: Falló la búsqueda en base_dn #(1) filtro #(2) de LDAP
